title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 10 December 2015 - XWiki
content:

14:57 <vmassol> now I need to fix the authentication for the webjars handler….starting work on it  
15:10 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
15:34 <msmeria> has quit  
15:37 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
16:06 <ClemensR> has quit  
16:20 <tmortagne> has quit  
16:22 <vmassol> ok stopping work on webjars auth check, please see my comment in the issue at http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12900 (we need to decide what we want)  
16:23 <vmassol> fixing vfs module now  
16:23 <msmeria> has quit  
16:39 <MasterPiece> has quit  
17:29 <Enygma`> vmassol: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-7.1.x/140/console looks related to your commits on the branch  
17:30 <vmassol> thanks Enygma` checking  
17:31 <vmassol> hmm strange, I built if locally  
17:31 <vmassol> \*it  
17:32 <vmassol> I don't understand the problem, restarting a build  
17:33 <vmassol> seems ok now...  
17:33 <vmassol> weird  
17:34 <Enygma`> yes, maybe it was a partial build  
17:35 <vmassol> mflorea: "'when he accesses the old page" —> "when accessing the old page"?  
17:35 <vmassol> avoid the 'he"/"she" issue :)  
17:35 <mflorea> sure, sounds good  
17:35 <vmassol> this is a cool feature  
17:35 <vmassol> users are going to love it  
17:36 <vmassol> (even though we'll need to implement it properly at some point)  
17:36 <vmassol> :)  
17:36 <vmassol> cool that you took it  
17:37 <mflorea> yes, for I'll use the xobject solution  
17:37 <mflorea> for now  
17:37 <mflorea> XWiki.RedirectClass object on the old page  
17:38 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:40 <vmassol> ah ok thought you were writing some $response.sendReidrect()… :)  
17:41 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
17:41 <vmassol> has quit  
17:45 <mflorea> yes, the sheet does this  
17:46 <mflorea> the xobject allows you to see the existing redirects more easily (in a live table)  
17:47 <mflorea> you can remove the redirects or delete these pages more easily later if you want to  
17:49 <mflorea> it also allows us to add some parameters on the redirect URL without touching existing redirects, for instance to implement "When being redirected, the user should see this in the target page ("Redirected from Space.DocA")" (later, if we want to)  
17:52 <vmassol1> yes it's better I agree, I just thought you were going for the easy route  
17:52 <vmassol1> it also allows to edit the page with the redirect  
17:53 <vmassol1> is now known as <vmassol>  
17:53 <vmassol> err no forget that  
17:53 <vmassol> it's the same ;)
